sen.j: 元禄の大古酒（げんろくのだいこしゅ）は1968年に長野県北佐久郡望月（もちづき）町で開封された、元禄時代に仕込まれたとされる日本酒。
sen.e: Genroku no Daikoshu is sake prepared in the Genroku period and opened in Mochizuki-machi, Kitasaku Country, Nagano Prefecture in 1968.
Genroku no Daikoshu is sake which is believed to be prepared in the Genroku era and took off a seal in Mochizuki-machi, Kitasaku County, Nagano Prefecture in 1968.
sen.cmt: which is believed to beを追加しました。Period → eraOpened → took off a sealCountry → County
sen.e: Genroku no Daikoshu is sake which is believed to be prepared in the Genroku era and took off a seal in Mochizuki-machi, Kitasaku County, Nagano Prefecture in 1968.

sen.j: 醸造されたのは元禄2年（1689年）前後で、固形分の混ざった日本酒醪造りをそのまま貯蔵したものであった。
sen.e: It was brewed around 1689 and its Nihonshu moromi-zukuri was stored including solid contents without filtration.
It was brewed around 1689 and its Nihonshu moromi-zukuri was stored including solid contents without filtration.
It was brewed around 1689 and its Nihonshu moromi-zukuri was stored including solid contents without filtration.

sen.j: となれば、日本酒熟成期間は279年に及ぶことになる。
sen.e: So, the aging period is 279 years.
So, the aging period is 279 years.
So, the aging period is 279 years.

sen.j: 開封されたとき、内容物である酒は蒸発により量的に減少し、アルコール度数は24%にまで高まっていたという。
sen.e: When it was opened, the contents decreased by evaporation and the alcohol degree rose by 24%.
When it was opened, the contents decreased by evaporation and the alcohol degree rose to 24%.
When it was opened, the contents decreased by evaporation and the alcohol degree rose to 24%.

sen.j: 通常の日本酒よりはるかに高い。
sen.e: It is much higher than that of normal sake.
It is much higher than that of normal sake.
It is much higher than that of normal sake.

sen.j: これは水とエチルアルコールの分子の大きさの違いから、透過力が異なったためと思われる。
sen.e: It is assumed that it was because the difference of molecular size between water and ethyl alcohol made the difference of penetrating power.
It is assumed that it was because the difference of molecular size between water and ethyl alcohol made the difference of penetrating power.
It is assumed that it was because the difference of molecular size between water and ethyl alcohol made the difference of penetrating power.

sen.j: 酒の色は黒色になっていた。
sen.e: The color of sake turned black.
The color of sake turned black.
The color of sake turned black.

sen.j: 容器は白磁の壺、栓は漆塗りの桐であり、さらに漆を上塗りして封印してあった。
sen.e: The container was a white porcelain pot and the cap was lacquered paulownia sealed by giving a final coat of lacquer.
The container was a white porcelain pot and the cap was lacquered paulownia sealed by giving a final coat of lacquer.
The container was a white porcelain pot and the cap was lacquered paulownia sealed by giving a final coat of lacquer.

sen.j: その壺は現在、大沢酒造資料館に所蔵されている。
sen.e: The pot is owned by Osawa Shuzo Shiryokan now.
The pot is owned by Osawa Shuzo Shiryokan now.
The pot is owned by Osawa Shuzo Shiryokan now.
